fields.name: Escape from the Orc Lair
fields.description: You are captured by a band of orcs. Now you must fight your way out of their lair!
fields.intro_text:
Boy do you feel good as you go looking for a new adventure!  Striding down a nearby dark alley, you feel so energetic that you almost don't feel it when you are clubbed in the head by a group of orcs.

You wake up very groggy sometime later and you hear part of one of their conversations.

Voice #1:  "It won't be long before we have enough captives!"
Voice #2:  "I just hope we make enough ransom money, or I will have your head, Grishnakh!"

Unfortunately, you lapse into unconsciousness again, but you realize without much difficulty that it is your duty to escape and warn the Guild, before it meets certain ruin!

fields.name: You are in your cell.
fields.description: You are in a small dark cell.  Your weapons lie in the corner, apparently undamaged.  Unfortunately, there is no visible way out.  You do spy a loose brick...

fields.name: You are at a four-way intersection.  (N/S/E/W/U)
fields.description: You are at a four-way intersection.  A sign reading "Prisoner cell block A" points towards the ceiling.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (S/E/W)
fields.description: You are at a T-intersection of passages going east, west, and south.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are south and west.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection of passages going north, south, and west.

fields.name: You are in a small room.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in a small room with exits leading in all four directions.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are south and west.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are north and west.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are north and east.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection.  Passages go east, west, or north.  You notice a funny rock about the size of a door...

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are north and east.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection.  Passages go north, south, and east.

fields.name: You are in a small room.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable small room.  Exits lead in all directions.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are south and west.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are south and east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are north and east.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south corridor.  North will take you through the secret door towards your cell, and south leads to an unremarkable intersection.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection.  You can go north, east, or west.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west corridor.  To the east is a bend in the corridor, and to the west is an intersection.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are at a bend in the corridor.  Passages lead north and west.

fields.name: You are in a foul smelling corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in a stinky north/south corridor.  To the south is an intersection, and you can smell garbage and (ahem) dung to the north.

fields.name: You are in the refuse room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in a room at the end of the tunnel.  To put it frankly, the place stinks unlike anything that has ever stunk before.  Covering nearly the entire floor, but piled mainly in one corner, is a huge garbage/manure pile.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W/U)
fields.description: You are in an east-west corridor.  Going either way will bring you to a T-intersection.  You also notice a sign on the wall, pointing to the ceiling, which reads "Prisoner cell block B."

fields.name: You are in the elf's cell.  (D)
fields.description: You are in a small cell, much like your own.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection.  You can go north, south, or east.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in (of course) an unremarkable north/south corridor.  To the south is an intersection, and to the north a room.

fields.name: You are in the armory.  (S)
fields.description: Reminding you of Marcos' shop from the Main Hall, you realize that you are in the armory.  Weapons abound in this lifeless room and there is an open cabinet on the wall with the words, "Darrik's Bane" inscribed on the wood.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north/south corridor.  To the north is a T-intersection and to the south you can hear lapping water.

fields.name: You are on the north shore.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are standing in the sand, on the north side of a lagoon.  The water is almost perfectly blue here, and no life is in sight.  Luckily, however, there is a wooden canoe here, which can take you to the exit on the south end.

fields.name: You are in the blue lagoon.  (N/S)
fields.description: You have made it to the middle of the lagoon safely.  You can see the north and south exits clearly from here.

fields.name: You are on the south side.  (N/E)
fields.description: You have reached the south side of the lagoon.  A corridor lies to your east, water to your north.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in another unremarkable corridor.  To the east the passage continues and to the west you see a small lake.  On the wall pointing east is a sign that says, "ZOO ---->".

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a corridor which looks basically the same as all the others.  To the west it continues and to the east is an intersection.

fields.name: You are at a T-intersection.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable T-intersection.  Passages go north and west.  To the south is a room.

fields.name: You are in the zoo.  (N)
fields.description: You are in a small excavation in the rock.  The place is being blasted so that a zoo can be put up for the children of the up-and-coming orc community.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Passages go south and east.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west corridor.  No life forms are visible.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east-west corridor.  You notice a large poster on the north wall.

fields.name: You are in the treasure room.  (S)
fields.description: You are in the room that is used for storing treasure.  Unfortunately, due to lack of government funding, there is not much left.  The exit is to the south.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/W)
fields.description: You are another unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your choices are south and west.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (N/S)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable north-south corridor.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/W)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  You can go north or west.

fields.name: You are in a corridor.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in an unremarkable east/west tunnel.  Either way will take you to a bend in the corridor.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Your only choices are south and east.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (N/E)
fields.description: You are at an unremarkable bend in the corridor.  Passages go north and east.  You notice a painting of a door to the west.

fields.name: You are at a bend in the corridor.  (S/W)
fields.description: You find yourself at a bend in the corridor.  Passages go west to another bend, and south to a small, dark room.

fields.name: You are in the Orc Council Room!  (N)
fields.description: You are in a small dark room.  You cannot see a thing at first, but suddenly the room lights up brilliantly.

fields.name: You are at the entrance/exit.  (S/E)
fields.description: Yes!  You've done it!  You see sunlight streaming in from the south!  Ahead of you is freedom!  Of course, you could always go back inside by moving to the east.

fields.name: platinum coins
fields.description: You see a small pile of platinum coins here.

fields.name: crystal
fields.description: You see a large, colorless crystal.  You cannot tell neither its type, nor its value.

fields.name: ruby
fields.description: You see a large ruby here.  It reflects the dim light very well, in fact, it almost glows!

fields.name: coins
fields.description: You see a small pile of coins.

fields.name: skull
fields.description: There is a small skull here.  Although it is bloody and scraped up, it almost looks like it's smiling at you!

fields.name: puzzle solution book
fields.description: There is a thin leaflet here.  Part of the title is smudged, but you can read, "How to solve" .... "Revenge."  Your only guess is that it is the solution to a murder/mystery story.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: You see a standard mace.

fields.name: Darrik's Bane
fields.description: The sword from the cabinet is delicately carved and extremely sharp.  It lets off a glow that constantly changes from red to green to blue, and then to red again.  These must be stupider-than-normal orcs to have left the cabinet unlocked!

fields.name: snargaxe
fields.description: You see the axe Snarg was using.

fields.name: flargaxe
fields.description: You see the axe Flarg was using.

fields.name: sword
fields.description: You see the sword belonging to Corondol.

fields.name: blorgflail
fields.description: You see the flail belonging to Blorg.

fields.name: klorgflail
fields.description: You see the flail belonging to Klorg.

fields.name: scimitar
fields.description: You see a scimitar--  A sword with a sharp curved blade.

fields.name: borksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Bork.

fields.name: corksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Cork.

fields.name: dorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Dork.

fields.name: gorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Gork.

fields.name: horksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Hork.

fields.name: jorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Jork.

fields.name: lorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Lork.

fields.name: broadsword
fields.description: You see a broadsword, previously owned by Eugene.

fields.name: rorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Rork.

fields.name: porksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Pork.

fields.name: norksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Nork.

fields.name: sorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Sork.

fields.name: torksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Tork.

fields.name: vorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Vork.

fields.name: worksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Work.

fields.name: yorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by York.

fields.name: zorksword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Zork.

fields.name: mortysword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Mortimer.

fields.name: ferdysword
fields.description: You see the sword owned by Ferdinand.

fields.name: muksword
fields.description: You see Muk's sword.

fields.name: puksword
fields.description: You see Puk's sword

fields.name: wuksword
fields.description: You see Wuk's sword.

fields.name: horthsword
fields.description: You see Horth's sword.

fields.name: jorthsword
fields.description: You see Jorth's sword.

fields.name: dead otyugh
fields.description: You see the repulsive body of the dead otyugh.

fields.name: dead pike
fields.description: You see the giant pike.  Its gills are still, and it doesn't seem to be swimming too vigorously anymore.

fields.name: Mork's body
fields.description: You see the body of the dead alien.  Boy is Orson going to be pissed!

fields.name: a secret door going down
fields.description: By moving the loose brick you found a secret door going down!

fields.name: a secret door going south
fields.description: By touching the funny rock you found a secret door going south!

fields.name: a secret door going north
fields.description: You tear down the poster and find a secret door going north!

fields.name: a secret door going west
fields.description: The picture turns out to actually be a secret door leading west!

fields.text: Part of the title is smudged, but you can read, "How to solve" .... "Revenge."  Your only guess is that it is the solution to a murder/mystery story.

fields.name: Snarg
fields.description: You see a bugbear named Snarg standing before you.

fields.name: Flarg
fields.description: You see a bugbear named Flarg standing before you.

fields.name: Corondol
fields.description: In front of you is an elf by the name of Corondol.  He appears to be an average warrior and seems very glad to see you.

fields.name: Otyugh
fields.description: You see an otyugh--  A weird creature with a huge gaping mouth, two tentacle arms, and a sensory organ stalk.  Otyugh are always ready to add some fresh meat to their usual, not-so-pleasant diet.

fields.name: Blorg
fields.description: There is a hobgoblin named Blorg standing here.

fields.name: Klorg
fields.description: There is a hobgoblin named Klorg standing here.

fields.name: Giant Pike
fields.description: You see a giant pike.  He would be just like a normal fish except that he is very fast, very hostile, very hungry, and an unnatural 10-feet long.

fields.name: Palaneldor
fields.description: You see a half-elf here, who goes by the name of Palaneldor.  He looks like a pretty good fighter, but rather young and inexperienced.

fields.name: Bork
fields.description: You see an orc named Bork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Cork
fields.description: You see an orc named Cork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Dork
fields.description: You see an orc named Dork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Gork
fields.description: You see an orc named Gork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Hork
fields.description: You see an orc named Hork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Jork
fields.description: You see an orc named Jork.  (Incidentally, you know all their names because each orc has his name stitched onto his Hartz flea protection collar.)

fields.name: Lork
fields.description: You see an orc named Lork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Eugene
fields.description: You see an orc named Eugene.  He wears thick glasses and looks kind of wimpy, but something tells you that there's more to him than meets the eye.

fields.name: Rork
fields.description: You see Rork the orc.  He points his sword at you and says, "Snort, snort!"

fields.name: Pork
fields.description: You see Pork the orc.  He points his sword at you and says, "Snort, snort!"

fields.name: Nork
fields.description: You see Nork the orc.  He points his sword at you and says, "Snort, snort!"

fields.name: Mork
fields.description: You see Mork from Ork.  He points his finger at you and says, "Nan-oo, nan-oo!"

fields.name: Sork
fields.description: You see an orc named Sork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Tork
fields.description: You see an orc named Tork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Vork
fields.description: You see an orc named Vork.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Work
fields.description: You see an orc named Work.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: York
fields.description: You see an orc named York.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Zork
fields.description: You see Zork.  He's half-orc and half-grue.

fields.name: Mortimer
fields.description: You see an orc by the name of Mortimer.  He smells bad.

fields.name: Ferdinand
fields.description: You see an orc by the name of Ferdinand.  He smells bad.

fields.name: Buk
fields.description: You see an orc named Buk.  He has an unusually large forehead and talks with a funny lisp.

fields.name: Orc
fields.description: You see Cuk, Duk, Guk, Huk, Juk, Kuk, Luk, Nuk, Ruk, Suk, Tuk, Vuk, Yuk, Zuk, Blag, Clag, Glag, Plag, Slag, Borth, Corth, Dorth, Forth, Gorth, Lorth, Morth, Porth, and Rorth.  They are a bunch of smelly orcs.

fields.name: Muk
fields.description: You see an orc named Muk.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Puk
fields.description: You see an orc named Puk.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Wuk
fields.description: You see an orc named Wuk.  He sees you too, and decides he doesn't like you.

fields.name: Horth
fields.description: You see Horth the orc.  He points his sword at you and says, "Snort, snort!"

fields.name: Jorth
fields.description: You see Jorth the orc.  He points his sword at you and says, "Snort, snort!"
